courses.title: PHP
courses.description: PHP (recursive acronym for PHP: Hypertext Preprocessor ) is a widely-used open source general-purpose scripting language that is especially suited for web development and can be embedded into HTML.

courses.title: PYTHON
courses.description: Python is an interpreted, object-oriented, high-level programming language with dynamic semantics developed by Guido van Rossum. It was originally released in 1991.

courses.title: ANGULAR
courses.description: Angular is a development platform, built on TypeScript. As a platform, Angular includes: A component-based framework for building scalable web applications.

courses.title: HTML5
courses.description: HTML is the standard markup language for creating Web pages. HTML describes the structure of a Web page. HTML consists of a series of elements. HTML elements tell the browser how to display the content.
